overview: When Scott wakes up one morning, to his horror he is tattooed from head to toe with stupid sayings. In distress, he flees to his friend Jay Cee, who jogs Scott's memory: the previous night's excessive binge ended in the  Tattoo-Go-Go-Rama. Scott's only option to rid himself of the unwelcome body adornment seems to be a skin transplant. For this, however, 142 willing donors must first be found.
title: Skin Trade
